items.content_html:
How I learn new tech fast:

  1. Build something real
  2. Document decisions & trade-offs
  3. Teach it (forces clarity)

This weekend: RAG system -> writing 3 docs explaining every technical decision. Now I‚Äôm onto really understanding embeddings.

Writing = understanding. I‚Äôll update on how that goes.

items.content_html:
Day 3 of FODMAP: turns out that artisan bimbo bread has been destroying my gut for years and I just thought it was ‘normal’

Not gluten. Not lactose. Just wheat fructans. Who knew.

Watched: Lion üçø

The movie was incredibly touching. We loved it and cried a lot, however, the drama was a bit too much for my 9yr old son, who fell asleep by the last 30 minutes of the movie.
